website_summaries.verdict: This Merrell mid-cut hiking boot offers readiness on the trails with its provision of warmth and comfort. It was also acknowledged as a supportive and grippy footgear. What makes it most endearing to buyers is its affordability.However, it seems to fall short on protection against water encounters. All in all, the Thermo Chill Mid Shell Waterproof appears ready on cold, winter hikes; constantly exposing it on slushy grounds isn’t recommended though.
pros: Most consumers observed that the Thermo Chill Mid Shell Waterproof fits true to size
The warmth delivered by this winter footgear impressed a bunch of owners
According to several owners, it was a great gear to own considering its budget-friendly price
The ankle support provided by the Thermo Chill Mid Shell Waterproof from Merrell pleased a few wearers
Based on a handful of user reviews, it was a comfortable hiking boot
Its outsole was praised by a portion of wearers as it offered reliable traction
cons: A couple of users said that the waterproofing of the Merrell Thermo Chill Mid Shell Waterproof was inadequate, especially when exposed to sloppy snow conditions

customer_reviews.title: Incredible comfort and stability
customer_reviews.text: I did a six mile Lake District hike in these Merrill Thermo Chills straight out of the box, and somehow they were more comfortable than boots I’ve been wearing for months! For someone who frequently rolls over on my ankle I was amazed at how much support they offered, even on wet rocks. So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: stephenmark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these Boots every morning for the last two weeks, walking dog around muddy , frosty, wet, New Forest footpaths my feet have stayed warm and dry unlike the rest of me, I bought one size up remembering last Merrill's and these fit perfectly, I am very pleased to have bought these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water resistance and warmth
customer_reviews.text: Did a 12 hour hike in the lake district up and over three peaks and through very wet and snowy conditions and my feet were only wet at the end due to sweat! They were incredibly warm and waterproof throughout the hike.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Warm, comfortable, light weight. They feel sturdy enough for the price. I tested in puddles an it covered the laces and was still dry. Couldn't ask for better. Edit - i forgot to add i walked through wwt grass for a few miles and feet still stayed dry.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Appleton

customer_reviews.title: great boots
customer_reviews.text: bought these for walking the dogs, they are really comfortable and rugged, they are VERY WARM, I normally take a size 10, but after reading the reviews I ordered a 10.5 and they're perfect. I needed them to be water proof and after walking through mud, streams and lots of rain I have not been disappointed. they are great boots.
customer_reviews.author: M. C

customer_reviews.title: Worth a punt.
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted these boots to be good as I’ve had Merrell boots in the past all of which have been excellent. Unfortunately having purchased these for camping trip which rained all weekend after one day the right hand boot started to leek. I was so disappointed sending theses back. There a great looking boot and very comfortable and I’ve no doubt that this is probably a hick up with this pair. Don’t let this review put you off for the money there well worth the buy. Take a chance and buy yourself a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Waterproof Boots !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Boots !! I am a Postman and i walk around in heavy Rain for 4 hours a day.And i can safel y say these boots are completely waterproof.and what else is amazing about these boots is they are completely dry after 5 minutes.No breaking in really comfortable from the time you put them on.Best waterproof walking boots i have ever had.And thats after 22 years of walking in all kinds of weather.Awesome Boots !!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. F. Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Boot but Stinky!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby 'loved' these for work. Looked great and he bought 3 pairs all of which have sadly been returned. Whilst he rotates them with other boots which means he would never wear the same pair more than twice per week, all 3 pairs got smelly within a few months. His socks were always wet at the end of the day which never happens with any other boots he has worn. So, his favourite looking and most comfortable Merrell boots are no more. Kudos however to both Merrell and Amazon for refunding after several months of wear. Such a shame though.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Wet feet.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these when walking the dogs on a nearby nature reserve when the ground is wet or there is snow. One shoe has now started to leak which after the amount of times I have worn them is very poor. They also are NOT breathable as other reviews have stated. Shame really that they have split as they are comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt Major

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Like having the foot in cotton wool, not too heavy, I'm size 7,7.5 and took 8 becouse of thicker socks and is likr molded to my foot. Most important, it is WATERPROOF! Did 10 very muddy miles the first time wearing it and unlike all other shoes like this, it didn't do any blisters. Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Miss M. Majdak Selic

customer_reviews.title: Very DISAPPOINTED with this merrell product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots on the 6th October 2019, I initially did not wear them for about 3 weeks. So I have actually only been wearing them for about 2 weeks, today 14th November I have noticed the sole is actually coming away from the upper left boot!. I did not expect that to happen with merrells, l only use them for dog walking in a light terrain. I bought these boots for there waterproof & winter capabilities, so l am very disappointed with this product and will not be buying ' MERRELL's' again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Martin Carter

customer_reviews.title: Merrel have solved the splitting issue near toes
customer_reviews.text: Merrell have solved the splitting issue near toes with this boot. These are a great boot that can take a beating. Excellent waterproofness. 15-20 mile hikes and no problems. I'll be buying these again. Hopefully the range is kept going.
customer_reviews.author: MColl

customer_reviews.title: Light, warm, comfy, but size them carefully.
customer_reviews.text: Merrells are usually 1/2 size too small for me. I'm a 8.5UK so a 9 in a Merrell. I'm planning to use these in Iceland so with thick socks I ordered a size 10. This turned out to be a perfect choice thankfully. I was really surprised how light they are, as well as being really comfortable. I suspect the soles are quite a soft compound rubber as they are squishy and squeaky. This is sensible for a cold weather boot to give the most grip, a bit like winter tyres for cars. However, I suspect they would wear out very quickly when used in warmer weather, but I may be wrong. Overall I'm very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bridgford

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight. Size up for a thicker walking sock
customer_reviews.text: My usual size in Merrell trainers (Rant and Intercept) is a size 8. The usual fit is snug but very comfortable in a standard dress sock but slightly too snug in a thicker walking sock. Decided to buy these half a size larger 8.5 (43 EU) so as to accommodate a thicker sock and I'm glad I did as they fit perfectly and should keep my feet nice and warm through the winter. Only 4 stars as only worn them on a couple of time so far this Autumn/Winter.
customer_reviews.author: Andyb

customer_reviews.title: Dry feet.
customer_reviews.text: Working in gardens has its challenges on the feet. I bought these, being Merrel, knowing they are very good. Totally exceeded my expectations! Comfy, warm, but best of all my feet are dry. Worn 6 days a week for 2 weeks, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic boots!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered pronto from Spain and made to endure a few years in and around Shetland (!) They fit like a glove and feel like slippers. A Merrel fan, am totally enchanted by those lightweight and yet sturdy footwear. Looking forward to enjoying them in any extreme weather! Thank you, dear sellers, for providing sucha great item!
customer_reviews.author: Nat Hall

customer_reviews.title: Winter boots
customer_reviews.text: Initial impressions are good in terms of the look, comfort `out of the box' & quality of the product compared to other snow boots tried at a similar price point. I ordered a half size bigger than my normal size, which seems about right with having a thicker sock on. However, until the boots have been well used in earnest, and in the snow & cold in particular, it is not possible to advise how warm they are and how well they keep out the wet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Higgins

customer_reviews.title: great fit
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Build quality, design I'm yet to try them in sub zero later in the year. I normally use a Size 9, I ordered a 9.5 which is perfect for thick woolly socks. Dislike: The two top lace hoops. I would like them to be just normal hooks instead of loops.
customer_reviews.author: PBUK

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & ankle support
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots following an accident when I broke my ankle after slipping on Ice & was worried that the wellingtons I had always worn wouldn't give me the support around the ankle area, I was very pleased with the fit & how they supported the ankle, I would recommend these to anyone in a similar situation or to anyone that needs a sturdy, warm & comfortable pair of walking boots
customer_reviews.author: John Scott

customer_reviews.title: nice boot
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 9 r/h boot reasonable fit. l/h boot too tight. Appear to be well made. would not recommend until they get the sizing right.
customer_reviews.author: raymond griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a hiking trip in May 2020
customer_reviews.text: So, I won't be going on the hiking trip but I have worn these a few times to get them worn in and it wasn't necessary. Great fit, no blisters, warm, apparently waterproof. Definitely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Coward

customer_reviews.title: lIGHTWEIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots for my son. They are true to to size for him at 10.5 and he said they felt instantly comfortable. They are really light weight and very soft and cushioned. He didn't need to wear them in and wore them for a day straight away. Really pleased. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katkin

customer_reviews.title: These boots are water resistant not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I used these boots for the first time in heavy raid for a 2 hour hike on roads and they were fine. The second time i used them was for another 2 hour hike in light rain but across fields and rough ground. they were letting in water after about 30 minutes. (I know from my army days that the best test for waterproofing is walking through wet grass and unfortunately these boots failed the test).
customer_reviews.author: karl hill

customer_reviews.title: * Health Hazard * Do not buy *
customer_reviews.text: These boots are dangerous. I have slipped over 3 times now whilst walking across mottled drain covers on the pavement, and won't be wearing them again. I am steady on my feet, but these drain covers are like black ice to Merrell boots. It wasn't even snowing or icy when this happened, just wet. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: elvis mcdavros

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality - Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for certainly applies here. My husband is out walking our dog 3 times a day and they are comfortable, sturdy and weatherproof. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SheffTrace

customer_reviews.title: Decent boot
customer_reviews.text: I’m aware these are advertised as snow footwear but many people used them for hiking, hence why I purchased. Extremely waterproof but on a long walk, feet can sweat as not particularly breathable. My last boots were more comfortable all round. Still, not bad as I paid less then £50 for them
customer_reviews.author: mark jackson

customer_reviews.title: So good I’ve bought another pair in the sale!!
customer_reviews.text: Light comfortable and so far waterproof - done 15 miles in them now - really great boots - best pair of boots I’ve ever bought- lasted 4 months and stayed water proof!! Used every day 5/8 miles
customer_reviews.author: bob rylands

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots that served me very well on my Iceland holiday ... as others have mentioned, buy a half size bigger than you usually buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jerapah

customer_reviews.title: Great all round outdoor boots
customer_reviews.text: I'm a landscape gardener and orbarist. These boots are warm waterproof and provide a good firm grip around the ankle what I needed when working with climbing gaffs/spikes. The tread is good and I feel completely secure walking down muddy hills. I would definatly purchase them again
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: Happy with boots no problems with them so happy will buy another pair
customer_reviews.author: Paul Winstone

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a winter walking/mooching, non skiing time in the alps. Perfect. Comfortable. Great quality. Warm. Waterproof. The rig height for those conditions
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and warm boot, it’s little tight in front as my feet are little wider, otherwise perfect,
customer_reviews.author: HSG1977

customer_reviews.title: They are light in wait and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They were a perfect fit and comfortable, I am using them for hill walking, in the Ballyhoura mountains in Ireland, where there is some hard walking trails and some bog walking trails and these boots do it all, I had a pair of Merrell walking shoes before these and they were a lovely shoe as well. I would recommend this brand to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: kieran moloney

customer_reviews.title: Merrell very good brand ultra terrain boot
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of the material used to make this boots it’s well made and very warm.
customer_reviews.author: BEVEN

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: Comfy boots that fit really well. Have trouble trying to find boots that don't rub my heels or pinch across the toes and these are excellent. Use them for walks and running round playing Airsoft with no gripes at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable boot, no issues with rubbing or wearing in, however after 6 weeks the left boot has developed a leak and I'm back to soggy socks twice a day after walking the dog, not what I expected from a £70 pair of boots very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: I love Merrell’s, lets see how they preform!
customer_reviews.text: Only received them a day ago, the proof will be in the wearing of them, but first impressions are good
customer_reviews.author: Colin Giles

customer_reviews.title: Hard life
customer_reviews.text: They have had a really tough time, mud water, hard use, and they have been great !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, though uncomfortable for extended periods
customer_reviews.text: I would like to have given these boots 5 stars, but after 3 miles or so they start to rub my ankles (and yes I have tried everything to prevent this). Excellent for occasional usage but I had hoped to be able to use them more.
customer_reviews.author: Rob D

customer_reviews.title: PUKKA BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: Only like, the boots are a nice snug fit, and very warm and waterproof
customer_reviews.author: L.Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof as described especially in heavy rain and wet grass boots leaked in one boot got a refund
customer_reviews.author: Gary Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very good-didn’t let in any wet !
customer_reviews.text: Used these boots for first at the rainy/mud covered Download festival. They didn’t let in any water and seemed very robust. Breathable too I noticed ,when I removed them my socks were still dry. Fleece added great heat and I look forward to wearing in frosty winter conditions.
customer_reviews.author: We are the Carty’s

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely class boot, bought them for Nuuk Greenland, walking around the city (snow, ice) and a few hikes up a hill/mountain, the boots keep my feet warm and secure. Recomend. Bought them half a size above norm. to fit a wool sock and have space to swell.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Malte Hansen

customer_reviews.title: High quality and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, exceptionally (almost bizarrely) lightweight. Strong sturdy and warm, perfect for recent Iceland trip
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and waterproof. I used them in Norway with a lot of snow and there are brilliant. My advice: take 1/2 number more than your usual size.
customer_reviews.author: Meo

customer_reviews.title: There so comfy waterproof and he says there a cracking fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband says they are great best boots he has had ... So comfy when walking the dog five star
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots really lightweight very flexible and most importantly they are waterproof well tested
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth king

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really great walking boots, light weight, comfortable, and they are waterproof, my second pair of Merrill boots, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Merrell quality
customer_reviews.text: Great boot all as described and comfortable, lightweight but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Sims

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome warm comfortable good quality boots for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: phill hetherington

customer_reviews.title: Warm boots
customer_reviews.text: Had the boots in -20°c in kiruna in sweden and they kept my feet warm
customer_reviews.author: Basil mcke

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and went walking over hills three hours first day with them and was no problem very easy no breaking in
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Meenan

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Had these boots since july.im a security guard so standing in the rain etc.im so disappointed with these boots.my feet get soaked everytime it rains. They take days to dry out.wouldnt buy this make ever again
customer_reviews.author: Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable boots I've ever had. Lightweight warm waterproof. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary tetley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: For saying I ordered 9.5 they are a tight fit
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product just as described.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, warm and very comfortable. Used for walking in Iceland.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well fitting waterproof boot
customer_reviews.text: Well fitting (ordered a half size above normal). Lightweight and comfortable. Worn oa a very wet day and were totally waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: these are a replacement pair as first pair leaked so tested these today and all seems good no leaks so look forward to wearing on nice walks in muddy wet conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Bebbs

customer_reviews.title: WATERPROOF OR NOT?
customer_reviews.text: Excellent walking boot apart from right sole is coming away from upper body after 12 months of weekend use.....
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for winter weather
customer_reviews.text: These are properly waterproof & built to the usual high Merrell standards
customer_reviews.author: Nick Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit, light weight and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Boots were exceptional, would recommend them to my friends, also very light on your feet so makes walking a pleasure
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband who has a troublesome ankle and foot. Very comfortable, lots of ankle support and a great fit. He’s very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best boots ever
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, dry, cosy, and fit as they should, will be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Gary R.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so comfy and fit like a glove. Have done some small walks in all weather and my feet have been dry .
customer_reviews.author: mr m.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Great boots very light and comfortable, would highly recommend for walking
customer_reviews.author: Karen Abernethy

customer_reviews.title: Decent for walking around ski resorts.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and warm. Kept my feet dry in the snow. No discomfort from wearing them straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Feel comfortable. Not been walking in them yet so can't say what they will be like after a long hike.
customer_reviews.author: graham hargreaves

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very light and very comfortable from the first walk. Well worth the money 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Mr C Milbourn

customer_reviews.title: Great dry boot
customer_reviews.text: Good solid boot for long dog walks. Dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: ric

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Quality and feel on feet is excellent, very comfortable and certainly keeps my feet warm. I would have no problem recommending these.
customer_reviews.author: Mr J Lee

customer_reviews.title: Ankle support
customer_reviews.text: I got these boots as I have had an operation on my ankle,the high sides are perfect, they are also extremely comfortable so far i have worn them for 5hrs none stop at work
customer_reviews.author: ian northey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality boot
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of boots fit really well very please with them. They arrived early and where a great price too
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bowden

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant  waterproof  warm
customer_reviews.text: These came really quickly brought them for my husband he really pleased fit well happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for dog walking in torrential rain! Really comfortable & do not leak.
customer_reviews.author: ArgyllShopaholic

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Thermo Chill Mid Shell Waterproof Snow Boots
product_meta.description: This winter range consists of an all-over defense from snow and low-bulk insulation for all-around warmth in cold temps. It features m select dry impermeable membrane seals out water and lets moisture escape and waterproof pu coated leather and mesh upper metal hook and lacing eyelet for secure lacing. Bellows tongue keeps debris out and has protective rubber shell. M select fresh antimicrobial agents reduces shoe odor. 200 grams m select warm lightweight, low bulk insulation keeps you comfortable. Kinetic fit base insole is contoured like your foot and provides flexible, intuitive support for connected and protected movement. Molded nylon arch shank eva midsole for stability and comfort. M select grip outsole tunes each outsole with durable traction that grips when and where you need it. 5 mm lug depth.
feature_bullets: M-Select Dry Technology - Provides excellent waterproof protection while remaining breathable.
Mesh Upper - Allows air to permeate providing a constant supply of air and offers superb comfort.
Waterproof PU Coated Leather - Provides added durability as well as adding structural integrity.
Metal Hook And Lacing Eyelets - Allows a perfect and secure fit.
Bellows Tongue - Keeps debris out of the shoe.
